SQLFunctionSpec.Name: USR_UFN_CONSTITUENTBATCH_GETPHONESWITHSEASONAL
SQLFunctionSpec.Author: Technical Training
SQLFunctionSpec.CreateFunctionSQL: create function dbo.USR_UFN_CONSTITUENTBATCH_GETPHONESWITHSEASONAL ( @BATCHCONSTITUENTID uniqueidentifier ) returns table as return ( select ID, PHONETYPECODEID, NUMBER, ISPRIMARY, SEQUENCE, STARTTIME, ENDTIME, STARTDATE, COUNTRYID, SEASONALSTARTDATE, SEASONALENDDATE, BESTTIMETOCALLCODE from dbo.USR_BATCHCONSTITUENTPHONE where BATCHCONSTITUENTID = @BATCHCONSTITUENTID );
